column4: I'm trying to install Kubuntu on an HP Pavilion, almost identical to mine which works flawlessly. It's got a PCI GeForce 7900 gs, and neither boot options work.
Also, I have to pass noapic, or I'll get a kernel panic.
you can try with alternate CD
I mean if that is only way out why not? I why do you think you will have to manualy configure x?
